pageContext.claim: “So Robert Mueller has now asked for his long time Never Trumper lawyer to sit beside him and help with answers. What’s this all about? His lawyer represented the 'basement server guy' who got off free in the Crooked Hillary case. This should NOT be allowed. Rigged Witch Hunt!”
pageContext.analysis: There was nothing wrong with special counsel Robert Mueller to be accompanied by one of his aides when he testified before Congress. The attorney was sworn in as witness for the Intelligence Committee hearing, but did not speak.
